text: Lyell Cresswell (13 October 1944 â€“ 19 March 2022) was a New Zealand composer of contemporary classical music. He was the younger brother of Max Cresswell. He lived and worked in Edinburgh, Scotland. He won the APRA Silver Scroll for his work to New Zealand music in 1979. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand musicians Category:20th-century composers Category:21st-century composers
title: Lyell Cresswell
